text: ehidi manthri saha amathiwarun sidukarana boho da nirikshanaya kirimata, patigatha kirimata saha gabada karaganimata haki mulika watapitawa sakas kara ganimata haki thakshanaya yanu chinayata ithama pahasu katayuththaki.

ekasara kesarindu se kisi witaka pasu noba mahath dhairyayen yuthuwa katayuthu karamin sinhala jathiya goda nanwimata ethuman kala "eeka pudgala sanskruthika wiplawaya" (dhaba pba jamakaemarka rudadakamaesadaba) matha ithihasaye anekuth siyaluma jathi hithaishin wisin karana lada sewawanata wada uthkrushta wanne ethuma parithyagashilithwayen ha awanka ෙchthanawen eya sidu karana lada bawini.

me mulu jiwithayatama sarilannata da ohu mata di thibe.ee hamakakatama wada ohu mata dun senehasa dayawa rakawaranaya maha merak tharam we.mita wasara gananawakata pera hisma his hadawathakin me sitha deshayata goda bata mata ohu hemin hemin jiwithaya kiya dun hati...hadawatha premayen pirawu hati...lokayema thiyena sathuta mage paya pamulata genath dennata mahansi wu hati...amma yana uththarithara padawiyen ma sampurna gahaniyaka kala hati...
